verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will be in Singapore on June 12] .
President Donald Trump said Thursday his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] be in Singapore on June 12 .
President Donald Trump said Thursday [ARG1: his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] .
